String:
The Road Slasher was defeated. His unmoving corpse lay at the feet of {CHARACTER1}. 
The twisted visage of madness was still still lingering on his face even after his demise. It made {CHARACTER1} wonder what the man has gone through, to end up like this.

Next to the fallen Slasher, lay the weapon Barret had requested to be retrieved.
Looking at it {CHARACTER1} couldn't help but be fascinated by it. The blade possessed a mesmerizing beauty, its crimson hue shining brightly and seemingly holding an otherworldly sharpness.

{CHARACTER1} took the blade. It was time to return to the Guild.
TranslatedString:
道路屠杀者被击败了。他那不动的尸体躺在{CHARACTER1}的脚下。  
即使在他死后，扭曲的疯狂面容依然萦绕在他的脸上。这让{CHARACTER1}不禁思索，这个男人经历了什么，才会落得如此下场。  

在倒下的屠杀者旁边，放着巴雷特要求找回的武器。  
看着它，{CHARACTER1}不禁为之着迷。刀刃散发着迷人的美丽，鲜红的色泽闪耀着光辉，似乎蕴藏着超凡的锋利。  

{CHARACTER1}拿起了刀刃。是时候回到公会了。

String: As {CHARACTER1} followed the path, {GENDER1:cond:=1?he|=0?she} saw a hooded figure tending to a camp fire, its silhouette illuminated by the flickering light. The stranger noticed {CHARACTER1} and immediately their hands moved towards a concealed object to their right.
TranslatedString: 当{CHARACTER1}沿着小路前行时，{GENDER1:cond:=1?他|=0?她}看到一个披着斗篷的人在生火，火光映照出其轮廓。陌生人注意到了{CHARACTER1}，立刻将手伸向右侧一个隐藏的物体。

String: Wait and see what happens next.
TranslatedString: 等着看看接下来会发生什么。

String:
{CHARACTER1} decided to not do anything that could provoke the stranger, but immediately regretted the decision when {GENDER1:cond:=1?he|=0?she} saw that the stranger pulled out a loaded crossbow.

Without any hesitation the stranger fired the crossbow bolt at {CHARACTER1}.
TranslatedString:
{CHARACTER1}决定不做任何可能激怒陌生人的事情，但当{GENDER1:cond:=1?他|=0?她}看到陌生人拿出一把上了膛的弩时，立刻对这个决定感到后悔。  

陌生人毫不犹豫地向{CHARACTER1}射出了弩箭。

String: {DECISIONCHARACTER1} draws {DECISIONGENDER1:cond:=1?his|=0?her} weapon and charges at the man.
TranslatedString: {DECISIONCHARACTER1}拔出{DECISIONGENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}武器，朝那个男人冲去。

String:
{CHARACTER1} immediately acted and drew {GENDER1:cond:=1?his|=0?her} weapon faster than the man.

However, before {CHARACTER1} could attack the man, the man surrendered. It seems he realized that {CHARACTER1} would be faster than him and opted to beg for his life.
"Please, Slasher! Don't kill me! I-I give you everything I have!", the man stammered.

It seems there was a misunderstanding.
TranslatedString:
{CHARACTER1}立刻行动，拔出{GENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}武器，比那个男人更快。  

然而，在{CHARACTER1}准备攻击之前，那个人投降了。看来他意识到{CHARACTER1}会比他更快，选择了乞求生存。  
“请，屠杀者！不要杀我！我—I愿意给你我所有的东西！”那个人结结巴巴地说。  

看来这是个误会。

String:
{CHARACTER1} put {GENDER1:cond:=1?his|=0?her} weapon away and told the man that {GENDER1:cond:=1?he|=0?she} wasn't the Road Slasher. In fact {GENDER1:cond:=1?he|=0?she} was sent to deal with the Slasher.
Hearing that, the man sighed in relief, although his face was slightly red from embarassment over how he acted.

He invited {CHARACTER1} to sit with him at the fire camp and eat with him. {CHARACTER1} took the invitation.

The man told {CHARACTER1} that he knew that this was a dangerous road where the Road Slasher has been sighted and that's why he has been so on edge.
During their meal he gave {CHARACTER1} an advice.
TranslatedString:
{CHARACTER1}收起{GENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}武器，告诉那个人{GENDER1:cond:=1?他|=0?她}不是道路屠杀者。事实上，{GENDER1:cond:=1?他|=0?她}是被派来处理屠杀者的。  
听到这话，那个人松了一口气，尽管因为自己的行为而脸上微微泛红。  

他邀请{CHARACTER1}和他一起坐在篝火旁吃饭。{CHARACTER1}接受了邀请。  

那个人告诉{CHARACTER1}，他知道这是一个道路危险的地方，屠杀者曾在此出现，这就是他一直紧张的原因。  
在用餐期间，他给了{CHARACTER1}一个建议。

String:
"If you follow the road, you will eventually encounter a fork. Both paths eventually converge back, so it doesn't really matter which path you take. Except on the left path there are rumors of a dangerous beast. So take my advice and follow the road on the right."

After the meal, {CHARACTER1} continued {GENDER1:cond:=1?his|=0?her} travel on the road.
TranslatedString:
“如果你沿着这条路走，你最终会遇到一个岔路口。两条路最终会汇合，所以其实走哪条路并不重要。只是左边的路有关于一种危险野兽的传闻。所以听我的建议，走右边的路。”  

用餐结束后，{CHARACTER1}继续{GENDER1:cond:=1?他的|=0?她的}旅程。

String:
{CHARACTER1} launched {GENDER1:cond:=1?himself|=0?herself} barely in time, evading the deadly trajectory of the crossbow bolt.

The stranger clicked his tongue and immediately began to reload his crossbow with a second bolt.
"I'm going to make sure that the second bolt won't miss, Road Slasher! So you better leave now!"
TranslatedString:
{CHARACTER1}及时发起了反应，勉强躲过了弩箭的致命轨迹。  

陌生人咂了咂舌，立刻开始重新装填第二支弩箭。  
“我会确保第二支箭不会失手，屠杀者！所以你最好现在就离开！”

String:
{CHARACTER1} was too slow to react and the bolt pierced into the fleshy part of {GENDER1:cond:=1?his|=0?her} upper arm. Pain surged through {CHARACTER1} and blood started to drip from the wound. The stranger gave out a small cheer and immediately started to load a second bolt into his crossbow.

"How do you like that, Road Slasher?", the man triumphantly proclaimed.
TranslatedString:
{CHARACTER1}反应太慢，弩箭刺入了{GENDER1:cond:=1?他|=0?她}上臂的肉里。疼痛涌遍全身，鲜血开始从伤口流出。陌生人发出一声小小的欢呼，立刻开始将第二支箭装入弩中。  

“你觉得怎么样，屠杀者？”那个人得意地宣称。
